website_summaries.verdict: A good family canoe that is wide and big enough to carry your supplies.
pros: A longer canoe that has space for 3 people and a cooler
A very wide canoe at 40 inches
Includes a dry storage spot for your keys and wallet
Higher maximum weight than some others on the market
cons: There may be some problems getting this canoe delivered in good shape

customer_reviews.title: Great Family Boat
customer_reviews.text: This canoe is PERFECT for my family of 4! Boys 4 and 6 fir on the middle seat while dad and I paddle. Lots of great built in storage and a great ride. It is more of a deeper water boat- We have gotten hung up in the shallows a few times. You really can't beat the price on this boat, either! It's great for a family boat who are not interested in shooting the rapids.. Yet...
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 boys

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Canoe
customer_reviews.text: Wife, myself and 2 of our 4 children can ride in this canoe together. It has been great fun getting these out on lakes (we have one across from our neighborhood. Looking forward to doing a river float with it. We don't use the fishing rod holders. But the seats are comfortable. The cup holders are convenient. We've used the "cooler" beneath the center seat to store are wallets, keys and such. The paddle holders are super convenient for transport. It has just been such a joy to be out on the water with my family making lifetime memories. And it is this canoe that is giving us these opportunities.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great canoe well made
customer_reviews.text: Great canoe well made. Boyfriend uses it for duck hunting. Lots of rocking and movement in it while hunting and it hasn't tipped once. Hasn't had an issue with it at all. If anything he loves it. Be advised when delivering it will be delivered by an 18 wheeler.
customer_reviews.author: Venus

customer_reviews.title: Why do I have to have a headline?
customer_reviews.text: it is a really nice canoe, paddles well. the storage spaces are great! It has nice feature for the fisherman, and the other features are handy as well. It is as stable as any other canoe I have been in, I can't complain about that at all. I am looking forward to years of pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: ned j. augustyniak

customer_reviews.title: The canoe itself is awesome. Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I'd give 5 stars if the order did not come damaged and we had to have it replaced. The replacement process was very painless and we got a new one delivered within a week. Only thing tho is the damaged one is taking forever to be picked up and is taking up space in my garage! The canoe itself is awesome. Great quality. I would definitely recommend this canoe but check the whole thing outside of the packaging before signing off on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived warped and damaged. Interior was full of plastic shavings and rivet slugs that the manufacturer couldn't be bothered to remove. I contacted the maker and they blamed the Amazon warehouse. Would not consider another product from this company, it surely wasn't made well or protected for transport.
customer_reviews.author: MedicUSAR

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much. I live on a large creek in Eastern North Carolina and is ideal for what I want to do. A friend who knows a lot more about canoes than I do saw it yesterday and was very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Graham

customer_reviews.title: Excellent knock-about canoe
customer_reviews.text: The only thing not to like is the finish and the waviness of the bow line. It is durable, extremely comfortable, handles well, and tracks wonderfully. It easily holds two adults and two children. It can be loaded by one reasonably strong person. This thing looks like a toy, but works like a horse. If you care more about price than aesthetics, it is what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Saddened

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, steady enough for kids to get in and out of.
customer_reviews.author: jane haywood

customer_reviews.title: turned out to be a really good deal, put it out on the lake with ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this used, turned out to be a really good deal, put it out on the lake with the trolling motor on, worked great. wish they would put pictures of the used products
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kellie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome canoe
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected from the purchasing information. It is a great canoe that glides with ease over the water. It is also conveniently easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Whelan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Canoe! Sturdy and roomy and seems to be well built for a great steal of a price with free shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Mike and Cyn

customer_reviews.title: This canoe floats
customer_reviews.text: Nice canoe with storage and cup holders. The only bad thing is the bottom isn't flat so it doesn't sit flat when you load it up.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy that I ordered this, arrived in record time
customer_reviews.author: Bugtussle

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money Canoe
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and was very well received! Awesome price for what you get and does the job,fishing on a lake.
customer_reviews.author: Curly

customer_reviews.title: Very nice canoe. Got it registered in PA for 15
customer_reviews.text: Very nice canoe. Got it registered in PA for 15.00.
customer_reviews.author: angel

customer_reviews.title: Great canoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a very big and sturdy canoe. The price was great. We love it. Big enough for the kids and the dog!
customer_reviews.author: Karin F. Doheny

customer_reviews.title: I love it. The keel makes it a little harder ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The keel makes it a little harder to handle on the ground but otherwise it is everything I hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Don Monshausen

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great good quality have not used it yet....I'm excited..
customer_reviews.author: colleen d. boyce

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to load and haul
customer_reviews.text: We have taken this canoe out on the river twice already and a small lake once. It is easy to load and haul, accommodates the two of us, our gear and dog veyr nicely and is so much fun to use!
customer_reviews.author: Francis Story

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice canoe particularly for the price. Was delivered in excellent condiition on time.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Thomas J. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun Great Quality Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Nothing bad to say, It was a great price. It is comparable to any aluminum canoe that my family and I have ever rented. I find it to be more stable then Aluminum and it draws almost no water even with 4 of us and a dog. I would recommend this product to anyone. It shipped free from Amazon and pulled up to the house inside an 18 wheeler. the kids got a kick out of that. .rob.
customer_reviews.author: RobLen

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny! We're big people, but despite that, this canoe is very stable. My only negitive comment is that it is sold with an 800 pound weight limit (per the online details), but there is a sticker on the boat that says 720 pounds. We aren't near the limit, and that probably wouldn't have made a difference, but it could mean the difference between taking and not taking the dog on a camping trip when we are loaded with gear. Other than that, we couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Harden

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Took it out this week and it was great. Seats comfortable and loved being able to fit a flask of coffee in the seat and 2 mugs. Liked knowing keys were keeping dry too! Can't go wrong with this canoe. Do recommend buying the kayak transporter though as its a bit heavy to carry too far!
customer_reviews.author: londonjulia

customer_reviews.title: Could not be happier with it
customer_reviews.text: I used this after hurricane Irma flooded the river. Could not be happier with it. I put both of my generators in it plus my wife and I. Very stable and easy to steer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size awesome boat
customer_reviews.text: Great size awesome boat, the cooler seals well. The water tight twist lock compartment does not fit a Samsung s5; but, that is the point leave your phone home enjoy the water :)
customer_reviews.author: Gary Engle

customer_reviews.title: Chk twice  buy$ once not too hoppy🙃
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I thought ? Maybe that's what you get for think n🤑Could have done better at pro Bass🤑
customer_reviews.author: Kevin G.

customer_reviews.title: Canoe-y!
customer_reviews.text: Great canoe.. does everything you might expect from a canoe.. like floating and.. well that.. has a nice little built in cooler and.. really like it. Do buy some kind of canoe dolly to get it to and from the water though as it's a bit heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Murray N. Mclean

customer_reviews.title: Big and Tipsy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for individual use, and the occasional fishing trip with a friend or family member. Trying to use it myself was a mistake. This is definitely a two-person (minimum) canoe. The problem, however, is that with two people the canoe becomes very unstable. My wife and I went out with our dog, and if any of us moved at all, the canoe started to tip. We couldn't turn around, reach for things...nothing. Every time my dog stood up, the canoe started to tip. It looks heavy and big, and it's even wide in the center, but the stability just wasn't there. Luckily, Amazon let me return it for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Severely dented and scratched
customer_reviews.text: Severely dented and scratched. Did not risk putting in water to try.
customer_reviews.author: ACDC

customer_reviews.title: It floats with a fat wife
customer_reviews.text: This thing will haul a ton of s***, let me tell you. Food, beer, gear, one kid, and a fat wife. Oh, and me too. If you make your fat wife sit in the middle, and use the cooler under her for the food and beverages, you will have more to eat when you get to camp. Great idea. Amazon raised the price a'hundred bux right after i ordered mine. 400 w/ free shipping was a steal.
customer_reviews.author: the North

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Canoe
customer_reviews.text: The canoe looked very nice online and got great reviews; however, when it got to my Father-in-laws door (it was his 50th bday gift) it was damaged. It had scratches and dents all over the bottom and a hole in the canoe. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Klaw

customer_reviews.title: Alaskan Approved
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Stable if standing or in the wind -Can carry 3 adults -cup holders and a storage compartment -Plenty of space for backpacks and tackle boxes Cons: -Heavy -Slow to paddle due to the weight -scratches easily -no rod holders -difficult to carry especially because of the design of the handles All in all, I would definitely recommend this boat for the price and versatility of it.
customer_reviews.author: Xyooj

customer_reviews.title: mackinaw156 canoe
customer_reviews.text: This canoe is very stable , which is what my wife and I wanted. Its beam width is what makes it so. Had a bit of a difficult time finding a canoe dolly to transport to and from the water but eventually we got one that works fine. We are 'age challenged' and like things to be easy and stable. This boat fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: jjbp

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as scheduled, seats are now bolted on instead ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as scheduled, seats are now bolted on instead of rivets, allowing me to switch seats around. Installed oar holders, also use long kayak paddle. Tube floaties along rail as aid if it does capsize. Got a piece of plywood on floor that I can also put across the seats and sleep.
customer_reviews.author: curtis dishman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! Light weight and big enough to take stuff along with you. Wide so it handles well.
customer_reviews.author: mike ackerman

product_meta.title: Sun Dolphin Mackinaw 15.6-Foot Canoe
feature_bullets: Ideal family recreational canoe with comfortable seating for three
Storage compartment and cooler under center seat
Bow and stern tie-down eyelets and built-in transport handles
Drink holders molded into every seat
